about_the_game: This is a full 3D simulation development type game. The character played by the player enters a virtual world, but a fault occurs during the entry process, causing the player to lose some memory. The only thing to remember is that the task is to find and establish a close connection with an important girl here. In this process, gradually retrieve memories and use various means to achieve goals. Provide companionship, assistance, or services (massage, etc.) to girls in daily life to enhance their liking for you, break through layers of spiritual and physical barriers, and ultimately form a strong connection with the girl to complete the final task. Free map, you can enter any room to find girls to interact with. In the game, you can also edit and change the appearance of girls' clothing, and after unlocking the action, you can "recall" it at any time to view it.

content_descriptors.notes: Including nudity, sexual behavior, and involuntary sexual behavior

detailed_description: This is a full 3D simulation development type game. The character played by the player enters a virtual world, but a fault occurs during the entry process, causing the player to lose some memory. The only thing to remember is that the task is to find and establish a close connection with an important girl here. In this process, gradually retrieve memories and use various means to achieve goals. Provide companionship, assistance, or services (massage, etc.) to girls in daily life to enhance their liking for you, break through layers of spiritual and physical barriers, and ultimately form a strong connection with the girl to complete the final task. Free map, you can enter any room to find girls to interact with. In the game, you can also edit and change the appearance of girls' clothing, and after unlocking the action, you can "recall" it at any time to view it.
name: 零号协议AgreementZero

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 7/8/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6300t or equivalent [4 or more hardware threads]
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 480 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 7/8/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 3060 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 480 16GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
